item.description:
Just a short note to let everyone know that we WILL be having a meeting this month ... Thursday, October 18th.  We are still working out the details for our presentation topic, so please stay tuned for further details.

We hope to see you all on Thursday!

Just a quick update for those considering attending tonight's meeting.  We're going to be presenting on Adobe's Photoshop Touch.  Penny and I will be bringing in our iPads for those who would like to "try before you buy" the app.  If you've already downloaded and used the app, please feel free to share your experiences.
item.how_to_find_us: The meeting will be held in Room 200, which is the President's Conference Room
item.name: October's Manchester Adobe User Group Meeting
